description: Brazilian compliance rules for brand strategy - ANVISA, CONAR, INMETRO

anvisa_rules.description: ANVISA (Agência Nacional de Vigilância Sanitária) - Health regulation authority

prohibited_claims.description: Medical cure claims require clinical evidence and ANVISA registration
Treatment claims require medical device registration

required_disclaimers: Este produto é um cosmético e não substitui tratamento médico
Resultados podem variar de pessoa para pessoa

prohibited_claims.description: Weight loss claims require clinical studies and ANVISA approval
Disease prevention claims are prohibited for supplements
prohibited_claims.alternative: Use 'contribui para o bem-estar', 'complementa a alimentação'

required_disclaimers: Este produto não substitui uma alimentação equilibrada
Consulte seu médico antes de usar

prohibited_claims.description: Diagnostic claims require ANVISA medical device registration

general_prohibitions.description: Doctor endorsement claims without documented proof

conar_rules.description: CONAR (Conselho Nacional de Autorregulamentação Publicitária) - Advertising self-regulation

prohibited_superlatives.description: Superlative claim #1 without verified third-party source
Best in Brazil/Best of all claims require comparative data from recognized institute
Unique claims without proof of exclusivity
prohibited_superlatives.alternative: Use 'diferenciado', 'inovador', or specify what makes it unique

ethical_guidelines.rule: Green claims must be substantiated with certifications

examples: USE: 'A cada compra, doamos X% para [instituição verificável]'

ethical_guidelines.rule: Comparisons must be factual, verifiable, and not denigrate competitors
examples: USE: 'Nosso produto tem Y% mais [atributo mensurável]'

truth_in_advertising.rule: All claims must be truthful, provable, and not misleading
red_flags: Testimonials without consent or payment disclosure

inmetro_rules.description: INMETRO (Instituto Nacional de Metrologia) - Product certification and quality standards

certifications_required.note: Cannot sell without INMETRO seal visible in product images
Mandatory safety testing and age grading

title_restrictions: No contact info (phone, email, social media)
description_restrictions: No external links to other marketplaces
image_requirements: Must show actual product (no mockups only)

brand_registry.requirement: Registered trademark with INPI (Instituto Nacional da Propriedade Industrial)

title_format.pattern: Brand + Key Feature + Product Type + Size/Model

title_restrictions: Brand name must match registered brand

pre_publish: All health claims substantiated with studies/certifications
No ANVISA prohibited words for product category
Superlatives backed by verifiable data or removed
INMETRO certifications obtained and displayed (if applicable)
Contact info (SAC) included in product page
All text in Portuguese (BR) with correct grammar
ongoing_monitoring: Competitor claims for comparative advertising rules

critical.description: Immediate legal risk - ANVISA/CONAR prosecution possible

high.description: High risk of marketplace takedown or CONAR complaint

medium.description: Moderate risk - may trigger customer complaints or marketplace warnings

low.description: Best practice violation - minor quality issue

resources.consumer_defense_code: CDC - Código de Defesa do Consumidor (Lei 8.078/1990)

notes.disclaimer: This is a reference guide. Consult legal professionals for official compliance advice.
notes.maintenance: Update quarterly or when major regulatory changes occur
notes.scope_limitation: Focused on common e-commerce categories. Specialized categories (pharma, finance, etc.) require additional research.
